title: Award-Winning Boutique Eco-Luxury Retreat with Saltwater Infinity Pool
description: Surrounded by a rushing river and swaying rice fields, Ulaman Eco-Luxury Retreat is ultra-boutique Bali bliss that celebrates sustainability without sacrificing comfort. With just 19 boldly imagined, soulful villas - crafted from gently curving bamboo and encircled by verdant green - this is the eco-escape of a lifetime. Savour brilliant farm-to-table Balinese cuisine at E.A.R.T.H., embrace tranquillity at ‘U by Ulaman’ Riverside Spa or laze the day away by the retreat’s winding saltwater infinity pool.
offer_address: Ulaman Road, Buwit, Kediri, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82121, Indonesia
